meanings.definition: The action of making something known or communicating indirectly
meanings.sent1: Her intimation of the decision was clear in her tone.
meanings.sent2: The intimation of the new policy spread quickly among the employees.
meanings.sent3: The intimation of the office move caused a stir among the staff.
meanings.sent4: The intimation of change in leadership was met with mixed reactions.
meanings.sent5: His intimation of the upcoming project excited the team members.
